PuzzleGenerator - Class in com.the.sudoku
This class is responsible to generate a wholly solved Sudoku puzzle and then depending on the difficulty, create a playable puzzle.

S

Sudoku - Class in com.the.sudoku
The main class which is responsible to: Handle the program call arguments. Check if the arguments value is within acceptable range. Handle the Exception throws from within the program. Act as an entry point fo the new game loop.
